Package model

Class Sledge

java.lang.Object
model.Sledge
public class Sledge
extends java.lang.Object
The Sledge class models a Sledge object and offers specific methods to work with.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Christian Reisenauer

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Sledge()  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.util.ArrayList<Present> getCargoArea()
    Returns the cargo area as an ArrayList to work with.
    boolean isReady()
    Gets the sledge readiness status.
    void loadPresent​(Present p)
    This method is used for load a Present object into the cargo area of the sledge.
    void setReady​(boolean ready)
    Set the status of the sledge to "ready".
    void showLoadedCargo()
    Prints out the whole content of the cargo area.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • Sledge

      public Sledge()

  • Method Details

    • setReady

      public void setReady​(boolean ready)
      Set the status of the sledge to "ready".
      Parameters:
      ready - Use "true" if the sledge is ready. Otherwise, use "false". Standard value for isReady is "false".

    • isReady

      public boolean isReady()
      Gets the sledge readiness status.
      Returns:
      "True" if the sledge is ready, otherwise it returns "false".

    • loadPresent

      public void loadPresent​(Present p)
      This method is used for load a Present object into the cargo area of the sledge.
      Parameters:
      p - The Present object to be loaded.

    • getCargoArea

      public java.util.ArrayList<Present> getCargoArea()
      Returns the cargo area as an ArrayList to work with.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList with all the stored cargo.

    • showLoadedCargo

      public void showLoadedCargo()
      Prints out the whole content of the cargo area.
